article:
I visited Mount Maofeng two weeks ago. I left the hotel at 7:00 and arrived at the foot of the mountain an hour later. On the bus, I happened to _ Chen Zhi, an old friend of _ I was _ to see him. We climbed the mountain happily together. _ our way to the _ of the mountain, we visited the Maofeng Cliff and the HalfPeak Temple and _ some beautiful pictures with our cameras. Then, about two hours later, we got to the top of the mountain. It was so great to _ the view   of the area at the highest part of the mountain. Mount Maofeng is also the highest place of Guangzhou, _ it is only about 534 meters high.
After having ice cream, we began to go back. We almost ran all the way. When we got to the foot of the mountain, we saw lots of visitors there. And they were waiting _ the bus there. When the bus arrived, most of them ran quickly towards it, but we didn't. We _ almost the whole day _ and climbing. As last we were _ but very happy.
